players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob was such a valuable member of our group. We need to be very careful about who we trust now."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie. We need to be cautious and work together to figure out who among us could have done this. Let's focus on the facts and try to eliminate any suspicion of innocence."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We don't have enough information to accuse anyone at this point. Let's try to gather more facts and eliminate possibilities together."
Charlie: "Diana, I noticed you said we should 'eliminate any suspicion of innocence' - that's an odd way to phrase it. Don't you mean eliminate suspicion and find the guilty party?"
You: "Let's focus on gathering facts and eliminating possibilities together. We should not jump to conclusions or accuse anyone without solid evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
